script: Get-Content "$dir\file_id.diz"
New-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X" -ItemType Directory
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\01 dynamic duo - ny again.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\04 skupers - dual flow (yathosho's twice the flavour edit).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\05 duo - biofeedback (nemo maps mix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\07 frames.of.reality - asfgs (dynamic duo's moskau remix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\10 skupers - some kind of kink (amphirion's for the sake of christmas remix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\11 zamuz - flame concept (ya-tho-sho treatment).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\14 zamuz - urban metallic (yathosho's almost november mix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\15 duo - biofeedback (hboy's organic mix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\16 amphirion - can't touch this (nemo oh yes i can mix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\17 synth-c - pearl beats (zamuz's welcome to pearland remix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\18 skupers - dual flow (yathosho's twice the flavour mix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\19 zamuz - waterburn (duo's icy hot mix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\20 synth-c - hextic (when you almost forgot you have epilepsy remix by frames.of.reality).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\avsres_texer_circle_heavyblur_27x27.bmp" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\v4_texer2.bmp" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"

Write Host ""; Write-Warning "
This installer wants to install selected APEs required by the presets in the pack. However, if you prefer to keep your locally installed versions, please skip the following step."
Copy-Item -Confirm -Force "$dir\avs\*.ape" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\01 hboy - fragile (yathosho's ill bill-board intro mix).avs"

Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\07 nemo - to paint with blood (yathosho's age of nuke rework).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\08 amphirion - abstractica part deux.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\09 nemo - edit the explode.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\10 synth-c - cool down in hell.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\11 shock value - forces of coherence (frames.of.reality's triwigle edit).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\12 les Noobiens - pullin' out these old bricks (nemo mix).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\13 yathosho - braun.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\14 skupers - calydon (zamuz's blast containment remix).avs"

Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\16 nemo - ghostdrilt (phirious remix).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\17 frames.of.reality - intro (yathosho's gif2give high mix).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\18 amphirion - enigma.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\19 hboy - jewel (synth-c rose remix).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\20 frames.of.reality - seturin.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\21 nemo - jaxx.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\22 zamuz - breathe (hboy's toxic lung mix).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\23 frames.of.reality - tvii scof.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\24 synth-c - vispuddle.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X\25 hboy - escalation of geometry.avs"
Remove-Item -Confirm -Recurse -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC010 VISBOT X"
